item.description:
WHEN: Sunday, December 9th at 10am

WHERE: Christopher Martin's at 860 State Street, New Haven

WHAT: Rated CT's best post-race party. What a great way to kick off the Holiday Season! Experienced runner or not, this is the race not to miss!

The Christopher Martins Christmas Run for Children 5K is run on a certified race course (CT07001JRG) starting in front of Christopher Martins Restaurant, 860 State Street, New Haven, CT. The course is flat and fast with 6 turns and runs along the historic State Street commercial district and through residential neighborhoods. View the race course.

Entry Fee - A new toy suitable for infants, children, or adolescents or make $12 Check payable to "Christopher Martins Christmas Run for Children". Drop off or mail a registration form and payment or a new toy (unwrapped) to Christopher Martins Restaurant, 860 State Street, New Haven, CT 06511. On line entry is available until December 7 at noon. EACH NHC RUNNER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HIS/HER OWN ENTRY FEE or DONATION.


Volunteers - are needed. Please call 203-481-5933.

CONTACT: Amanda O. (cell number will be emailed to participants the day before the race.)

Hope you'll just us for a great day!!
item.name: Christopher Martin's Christmas 5k for Kids
